4    | DESC:  Desktop utilities for HVA_WIN
5    | HIST:  20001027 V2.01 - Adapting for DJGPP
6    | ***************************************************************************/
7    | 
8    | #include "video/v_video.h"
9    | #include "window.h"
10   | #include "fortify.h"
11   | 
12   | extern SCREEN _cursvar;
13   | 
14   | /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
15   |     FUNCTION: wn_desktop()
16   |      PURPOSE: Save or restore current screen as the desktop
17   |       SYNTAX: int wn_desktop(int mode);
18   |  DESCRIPTION: int mode : 0 = Save current screen as desktop
19   |                          1 = Restore saved desktop (if any)
20   |      RETURNS: TRUE if succesfull restorage, FALSE if not one saved
21   |      HISTORY: 20-Oct-1993 V0.1
22   | --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
23   | int wn_desktop(int mode)
24   | {
25   |   static char *desktop = NULL;
26   | 
27   |   switch(mode) {
28   |     case 0:               /* Save desktop                        */
29   |       if (!desktop) {     /* Allocate memory if not already done */
30   |         desktop = (unsigned char *) malloc(_cursvar.cols*_cursvar.lines*2);
31   |         if (desktop == NULL) {
32   |           fprintf(stderr,"ERROR: out of memory for saving desktop");
33   |           exit(0);
34   |         }
35   |       }
36   |       v_gettext(0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,desktop);
37   |       return(FALSE);
38   |       break;
39   | 
40   |     case 1:                 /* Restore desktop if already saved */
41   |       if (desktop) {
42   |         v_puttext(0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,desktop);
43   |         return(TRUE);
44   |       }
45   |       return(FALSE);
46   |       break;
47   |   }
48   | 
49   |   return(FALSE);
50   | }
